ygData.subject: Re: Bear Hide Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: you have to give her EXACTLY what she wants, if she ask for 25 gold you have to give her GOLD not silver or anything else but gold (25 gold pieces) i made the
ygData.messageBody:
you have to give her EXACTLY what she wants, if she ask for 25 gold you have to give her GOLD not silver or anything else but gold
(25 gold pieces) i made the same mistake with the pelts. They also have to be the exact quality she ask for, you would think that if she ask for low quality medium would be as fine but it wont work.

/Askur Wizard of Veeshan

-----Ursprungligt meddelande-----

�mne: [eq_wizards] Bear Hide Armor


>From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
>
>I have tried to get bear hide belt and boots from Chandra Miller twice, but
>she just takes my money and bear pelts, and says something like "Oh thank
>you, but I still need the other thing". Has anyone gotten the boots and
>belt from her (I already have a polar bear cloak so don't need the bear
>hide cloak)? Talking to her is not the problem, she tells me what she needs
>to make the stuff. Thanks.
>
>Greg (Kronan)
